Reviews.Title: Love this tv
Reviews.Author: Theresa c
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this on groupon but when I did I was taking a chance since there's not to many reviews out there on this model I was looking for a good deal and this was it ! The setup couldn't be any easier just screw in the stand plug in your hdmi or what have you and that's it ! The picture is bright crisp and perfect I was very pleased ! The remote seems a bit generic but simple over all the bast deal I ever had on a new tv -

Reviews.Title: Sound Volume Stinks.
Reviews.Author: UtterlyTired
Reviews.Content: if you don't have a soundbar or a stereo receiver to hook this TV up to don't buy it. The sound is so bad you can barely hear it across the room with the volume turned all the way up. Other than that it's a pretty nice TV for the price.. Picture is good. Easy to use. My recommendation is spend a little bit more and get a name brand. Sorry Orion.
